org.mechio.api.motion

Interface JointProperty<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Value Type returned by this JointProperty.
    All Superinterfaces:
    org.jflux.api.common.rk.property.PropertyChangeSource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EnableMovement, EnableTorque, JointProperty.ReadOnly, ReadAbsoluteCurrentPosition, ReadAbsoluteGoalPosition, ReadCurrentPosition, ReadLoad, ReadSpeed, ReadTemperature, ReadVoltage, RemoteJointProperty

    public interface JointProperty<T>
extends org.jflux.api.common.rk.property.PropertyChangeSource
    Defines additional properties or capabilities of a given Joint, such as \ position feedback or moving speed.
    Author:
    Matthew Stevenson

      static class  JointProperty.ReadOnly<T>
      Defines a JointProperty which can read but not write.
